pullrequest.title: issue #16, update gazebo xacro so camera topic matches hardware (e.g. /sandia_hands/l_hand/camera/left/image_raw --> /sandia_hands/l_hand/left/image_raw).

content.raw: It wouldn't require simultaneous release if we left this as-is and fixed the problem on the drcsim side, but I think there is an advantage to using the matching topic name in this package, so I say we go for it.
content.html: It wouldn't require simultaneous release if we left this as-is and fixed the problem on the drcsim side, but I think there is an advantage to using the matching topic name in this package, so I say we go for it.

pullrequest.title: issue #16, update gazebo xacro so camera topic matches hardware (e.g. /sandia_hands/l_hand/camera/left/image_raw --> /sandia_hands/l_hand/left/image_raw).

content.raw: i don't know the implications this has on downstream simulation users, but it looks good to me. My apologies for not having the hardware driver match what you did in simulation; the naming convention in the simulator was better than what I did in hardware, but at this point, I think there may be more hardware users than simulation users (? not clear), so I think this is a good change to make.
content.html: i don't know the implications this has on downstream simulation users, but it looks good to me. My apologies for not having the hardware driver match what you did in simulation; the naming convention in the simulator was better than what I did in hardware, but at this point, I think there may be more hardware users than simulation users (? not clear), so I think this is a good change to make.

content.raw: we should retarget this for sandia-hand-5.3.0 (bump minor), to be released with drcsim 3.2.0
